Name: Fine Forgestone
Des: Use Luna Ore to create Fine Forgestone for Refine, which can refine rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charms to enhance their performance.

recipeVariants.Name: Fine Forgestone - Novice
recipeVariants.Des: Use Luna Ore to create Fine Forgestone for Refine, which can refine rings, Bracelet (L)s, Bracelet (R)s, and Charms to enhance their performance.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 15% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Luna Ore
materials.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
materials.Description2: The surface shimmers with a soft and unique luster. When the light changes, this luster dances along, as if there is a mysterious power flowing inside the ore.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Luna ore is commonly found near the Scout Lookout Post. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Burning Powder
materials.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
materials.Description2: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Burning Powder*15
lifeSkillSource.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 2 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 5 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax. Gain 1 extra item when crafting Fast-Burning Powder.

materials.Name: Charcoal
materials.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
materials.Description2: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

lifeSkillSource.Name: Charcoal*10
lifeSkillSource.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

materials.Name: Pine Timber
materials.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
materials.Description2: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipeVariants.Name: Fine Forgestone - Master
recipeVariants.Des: Producing Fine Forgestone with Luna Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R), and charms.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 15% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Luna Rich Ore
materials.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into a larger quantity of Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
materials.Description2:
The surface shimmers with a soft and unique luster. When the light changes, this luster dances along, as if there is a mysterious power flowing inside the ore.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters and have a much higher mineral content than ordinary raw stones, but their yield is lower, making them naturally more expensive.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Luna ore is also commonly found around Windwhisper Dome. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Rich Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Burning Powder
materials.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
materials.Description2: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Burning Powder*15
lifeSkillSource.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 5 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax. Gain 1 extra item when crafting Fast-Burning Powder.

recipeVariants.Des: Producing Fine Forgestone with Luna Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of earrings, Bracelet (L), Bracelet (R), and charms.

materials.Name: Luna Pure Ore
materials.Description: After smelting, it can be converted into an even larger quantity of Fine Forgestones used for Refine.
materials.Description2:
The surface shimmers with a soft and unique luster. When the light changes, this luster dances along, as if there is a mysterious power flowing inside the ore.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration. Some refined ores will crystallize, having a much higher content than ordinary raw stones, making them very rare.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Luna Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Luna ore is commonly found on the northern edge of the forest. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Luna Pure Ore, which is used to craft Fine Forgestone.
